survey_content: Visit our fanpage facebook to receive the latest news and customer support
content_not_support_audio: This movie has audio which is not supported by BeeTV, please install VLC player to play audio.
update_content:
Update version 2.1.3



- Modded version(like Ad-free version) cant be auto updated. Please use official version(download at beetvapk.me) to support developer.

- Download with Filelinked code: 30837432.

- Add some link providers.

- Hot fix bug autorun on some Android boxes.



Update version 2.1.2



- Add many HD direct links, Google Video and Fbcdn(fast link)

- Fix bugs.



Update version 2.1.1



- Fix trailer on Firestick, FireTV, Nvidia Shield and other Android boxes.

- Add feature to backup and restore watchlist, watched history.

- Add feature to auto backup before updating.

- Add feature to auto play next episode. You can choose number of link to auto play.

- Fix keyboard hide screen when logging to trakt on some devices.
